summary: Mobile-friendly web portal for Indian weavers to manage and share saree catalogs with different customer types (retail, wholesale, direct). Weavers register via Google account, manage catalog with images, customize branding, and share customer-type-specific catalog links.
architectural_notes: Mobile browser compatibility required for all views
Google OAuth integration for weaver authentication
Multi-tenant architecture to support multiple weaver accounts
Image storage and optimization for catalog photos
Catalog items require customer-type-specific pricing model
Backend auto-increment ID system scoped per weaver account
Public catalog pages must display weaver branding without authentication
Customer-type-specific pricing visibility on shared links based on URL parameters
Product image storage must support multiple images per product (up to 5)
Share functionality requires customer type selection UI before link generation
known_issues: Add/Edit catalog modal still has transparent background instead of white
Price input fields in ProductForm lack labels indicating which customer type each field is for
Public catalog links require authentication instead of opening directly without login
Share button on catalog listing page does not present customer type selection before generating link
Public catalog share links return 404 not found error
Multiple image upload (up to 5 images per product) not yet implemented
GitHub Pages deployment shows README file names instead of loading the web portal application

Design a mobile-responsive interface optimized for mobile browsers that works seamlessly across all screen sizes

Establish a cohesive visual design inspired by traditional Indian textiles, using warm earth tones (terracotta, saffron, deep crimson) with elegant serif typography and flowing layout patterns that honor the craftsmanship of Indian weavers
